description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Christmas Pudding Truffles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Christmas Pudding Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare Dr. Oetker Easy Choc as per packet instructions. Spoon over each truffle and top each with a silver cachous (you may like to alternate between milk choc and white choc). Allow to stand for 15 minutes or until set. Serve or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator until ready to eat.

Prepare Dr. Oetker Easy Choc as per packet instructions. Spoon over each truffle and top each with a silver cachous (you may like to alternate between milk choc and white choc). Allow to stand for 15 minutes or until set. Serve or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator until ready to eat.
